input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Kurt Adler Berries and Pinecone Ribbon Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 4-ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree with Burlap Base and LED String Lights'
  - Name='Sterling Inc. 7' LED Color-Changing Ozark Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Galarza 36' Lighted Pine Christmas Tree Andover Mills'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 72'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='6ft Christmas Garland Party Joy Cedar Garland'
  - Name='George Oliver Snowberry Green Garland for Home'
  - Name='BrylaneHome 9' Pre-Lit Holiday Classic Garland'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 4-ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree with Burlap Base and LED String Lights'
  - Name='Vickerman 9' x 14" Gold Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Vickerman 25' Grand Teton Garland'
  - Name='Coen Pre-Lit Elf Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Bristle Berry Pine Garland with Battery Operated LED Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kurt Adler Berries and Pinecone Ribbon Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a Christmas garland with similar pinecone and berry trim, likely similar in shape and use, but no mention of lighting or specific pine type like the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 4-ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree with Burlap Base and LED String Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is an artificial tree, not a garland, though it has LED string lights; very different product purpose and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 4-ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree with Burlap Base and LED String Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is an artificial tree, not a garland, though it has LED string lights; very different product purpose and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Inc. 7' LED Color-Changing Ozark Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An artificial Christmas tree, differing significantly in form and function from a garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Galarza 36' Lighted Pine Christmas Tree Andover Mills
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Product name suggests a Christmas tree, not a garland, so low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 72'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A lighted faux pine garland at similar length, with lighting, closely matches the reference in type, purpose, and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6ft Christmas Garland Party Joy Cedar Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pre-lit (implied by context) cedar garland, very similar in function and form though cedar instead of pine and shorter length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: George Oliver Snowberry Green Garland for Home
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A green garland presumably for decoration but no mention of pine, pinecones, or lights, so moderately relevant but missing key features.
A 9-foot pre-lit holiday garland, likely similar in core product type and function, strong relevance despite no specific pine type in name.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 4-ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree with Burlap Base and LED String Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate entry; same rationale as previous - an artificial tree, low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 4-ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree with Burlap Base and LED String Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate entry; same rationale as previous - an artificial tree, low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 9' x 14" Gold Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A gold fir artificial garland of similar length; though color 'gold' is a variation, the product is a lighted garland similar in structure and use.
A long garland, likely similar in construction and purpose though much longer than the reference; likely pre-lit but not specified.
A pre-lit Christmas garland aligning with reference in core features, but likely with different decorative elements (elf theme) which may imply different style or materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Bristle Berry Pine Garland with Battery Operated LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and very similar product type including pine, bristle tips, pinecones, and battery-operated LED lights; virtually identical in core features.
